connection_error.title: Oops, We Can't Connect to 0L Network
connection_error.body:
This is likely because the upstream peer (server) you use is down.

Don't worry, your account and coins are safe.

If you need to update or refresh your peers you can do so here:

wallet.newbie_message: Looks like you don't have any accounts

reminder_create.message_headline: You have generated keys for an account, but it does not yet exist on chain.
reminder_create.message_suffix: and provide us your Onboard Key to get onboarded.

account_list.message: Your balance will go down for every transaction you send, including mining.

keygen.title: Create New Account
keygen.description: After you generate an account and secret phrase, you'll need someone to send one 0L coin to that account for it to be created on chain.
keygen.onboard_key_description: This is also known as an Auth Key. For now you'll need it to be able to create the account on chain.
keygen.securite_note: This is your secret account password (mnemonic). If you lose it no one can help you! Write it down now.
keygen.account_tips: Your account does not exist yet on chain. You'll need to give someone your Onboarding Key so that they can create your account.

account_from_mnem_submit.title: Heads Up!
account_from_mnem_submit.body:
Are you sure you wrote down your mnemonic phrase?

You won't be able to recover your account without it. No one can help you if lose it.

This is the last opportunity to write it down.

account_from_mnem_from.title: RESTORE ACCOUNT
account_from_mnem_from.description: Using your recovery words (mnemonic) you can configure Carpe as a wallet to monitor, and send transactions
